project_descr: RMP aims to train technicians in recovery and recycling of refrigerants, undertake retrofits of chlorofluorocarbon based equipment and supply tools and equipment.

outputs.output_descr: The Suriname Refrigerant Management Plan Project is to train technicians in recovery and recycling, undertake retrofits of chlorofluorocarbon based equipment and supply tools and equipment, including recovery and recycling to the Mobile Airconditioning and refrigeration service sectors. SUR/REF/44/TAS/009.
